remarks: Virtual deduction proof of the right-to-left implication of ~ dftr4 .  A class which is a subclass of its power class is transitive.  This proof corresponds to the virtual deduction proof of ~ sspwtr without accumulating results.  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 2-May-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: sspwtr $p |- ( A C_ ~P A -> Tr A ) $.
